message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and developed to revolutionize its industry. This product offers unparalleled capabilities and efficiency, setting new standards in its field. We believe it could be a valuable asset to your business or personal endeavors. For this unique opportunity, we are offering the product at an exclusive price of $850000. We look forward to discussing how this product can enhance your operations and contribute to your success.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. While your product sounds impressive, I'm looking to keep my investment within a certain budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $750000 for your product. I hope this aligns better with your business strategy.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in our product. After careful consideration, I am pleased to provide you with a revised offer. We understand the importance of staying within budget constraints while still providing value. Therefore, we are willing to negotiate further. Our counteroffer for the product is $800000. We believe this price reflects the exceptional quality and capabilities of our product while remaining competitive with market standards. We look forward to your response and the possibility of a successful transaction.
